name: js-stack-from-scratch

scripts.test: yarn mdlint && cd tutorial/01-node-yarn-package-json && yarn && yarn start && cd ../02-babel-es6-eslint-flow-husky && yarn && yarn test && yarn start && cd ../03-express-pm2 && yarn && yarn full-check && pm2 kill
